repairedDockerfile:
FROM ruby:2.4 
RUN apt-get update && \
 apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y vim && \
echo "syntax enable" > /root/.vimrc && \
mkdir -p /usr/src/app && rm -rf /usr/src/app && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

WORKDIR /usr/src/app 

ADD Gemfile Gemfile.lock /usr/src/app/ 

RUN bundle install 

ADD . /usr/src/app/ 

WORKDIR /data 

ENTRYPOINT ["ruby", "/usr/src/app/secret.rb"]
